summary: Just started messing with the Creation Kit and this is the first follower that I've popped out!
descriptionHtml:
Just started messing with the Creation Kit and this is the first follower that I've popped out! I plan on updating this one fairly frequently, so make sure you're always up to date! Decided to start toying around with weapon textures, so I did a retexturing and included the "Sword of Ta". 

Selmar can be found in the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun! 
Can also be found on the [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=368294716]Steam Workshop.[/url] 

Enjoy!
[size=1]
[/size][size=1][b][size=4]Perks are:[/size][/b]
[list][*][size=1]Well Fitted 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Custom Fit 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Extra Pockets 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Bullseye 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Misdirection 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Armsman (20%) [/size]
[/*]
[/list]
[b][size=4]Spells are:[/size][/b]
[list][*][size=1]Fast Healing 
[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]Heal Other[/size][/*]
[/list][/size]

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/lzfPXeE.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/H0qY5Ae.jpg[/img][/center]
author: ICEDTEE

files.name: SelmarTa.rar
files.changelogHtml: Added a new item, Sword of Ta. It can be found on Selmar's person and can be taken by the player. It is a retextured scimitar.
